reviews.title: An excellent place with a familiar atmosphere which we can warmly recommend
reviews.text: The family welcome was perfect. Suites and estate were just what we wanted. We got all the help you could think of. So we enjoyed special help to get access to golf courses, good advice for reaturants or excursions to the whole area. At breakfast and for extra drinks we felt like members of the family.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Kanonkop Guest House in June 2007, as part of our Little Karoo / Garden Route drive from Capetown.
reviews.title: Paradise (will be) Revisted!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are lucky enough like we were to stay in the Paradise Suite, you will experience unadulterated luxury like never before!. This is probably the nicest room we have ever stayed in and the attention to detail is stunning. The photos will give you a good idea of what i mean!!.
reviews.title: Paradise at Kanonkop

likes.liked: — The luxury, fabulous breakfast, no hassle/friendly/relaxed hosts
likes.disliked: — Traffic noise on this side of Knysna

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The suite is really spacious, with a terrace overlooking the lagoon, i don't mean to be corny, but it is Paradise!. The whole property has an air of mature opulence about it, which is a credit to Chris and his family.
reviews.title: Kanonkop rocks!

reviews.text: The service was excellent and location perfect for travelling to Monkeyland, Plettenberg, Tsitsikamma, Storm River etc and i would recommend Knysna over Plettenberg for its beauty and excellent restaurants. You really really have to try the Phantom Forest Restaurant, which is an unforgettable eco experience and one of the best restaurants we have ever been to, and all for less than 600 rand. (6 courses and wine and tip!). The Dry Docks restaurant is also excellent.
reviews.title: A truly memorable holiday experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We couldn't recommend the Paradise Suite at Kanonkop Guest House highly enough, but stay at least 2/3 days!.
reviews.title: Best ever!
